properties.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 29 at 2:00PM CST until February 29 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Norman OK
properties.description:
...Red Flag Warning Issued for Northwest Oklahoma...

The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Red Flag
Warning for low humidity, warm temperatures and windy conditions,
which is in effect until 6 PM CST this evening.

* TIMING...Through the afternoon.

* WINDS...South 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph.

* RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Minimum humidity of 8 to 12 percent.

* TEMPERATURES...Mid 70s.
properties.instruction:
A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions
are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of
strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures will
contribute to extreme fire behavior.

NWSheadline: RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR WINDY, WARM AND DRY CONDITIONS FOR FAR NORTHWEST OKLAHOMA
